sentences.english: The degradation of Fuchsin acid in aqueous solution by contact glow discharge electrolysis is investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了接触辉光放电等离子体降解水体中的酸性品红。

sentences.english: Deep magenta with a distinct purple hue.
sentences.chinese: 带有明显紫韵的深品红色。

sentences.english: Wild poinsettias can grow up to four meters tall.
sentences.chinese: 野生的一品红能够长到4米多高。

sentences.english: Poinsettias are the best-selling potted flowering plant in the United States.
sentences.chinese: 一品红是美国最畅销的盆栽开花植物。

sentences.english: Bright red poinsettias are the best known.
sentences.chinese: 鲜艳的一品红是最有名的。

sentences.english: Zhao magenta team has asked him to do things the first commercial thinking.
sentences.chinese: 赵品红一直要求他的团队做事首先进行商业思考。

sentences.english: A nice box of chocolates or a poinsettia plant are good options.
sentences.chinese: 这时一盒上好的巧克力或者一株一品红不错的选择。

sentences.english: Set here the green component to set magenta color cast removal level.
sentences.chinese: 在此设定绿色成分以设定品红颜色删除级别。

sentences.english: For the same reason air information is printed in magenta .
sentences.chinese: 出于同样的原因，航空资料采用品红色印刷。

sentences.english: Babies or pets that chew on poinsettias might get sick.
sentences.chinese: 小孩或者宠物若误食一品红可能会致病。

sentences.english: High-magenta dye sound track projection and red light LED maintenance.
sentences.chinese: 高品红染料声迹放映及红光LED的维护保养。

sentences.english: Another plant that many people connect with Christmas is the poinsettia .
sentences.chinese: 另一个与圣诞息息相关的是一品红。

sentences.english: Hard water inhibited significantly the growth of poinsettia.
sentences.chinese: 硬水显著抑制一品红生长。

sentences.english: The poinsettia is native to Central America and needs warmth to grow.
sentences.chinese: 一品红原产于中美洲，需要在温暖环境中生长。

sentences.english: Babies and pets that chew on poinsettias can get sick.
sentences.chinese: 婴儿或宠物嚼了一品红会生病。

sentences.english: She plans to make use of him to exact her plan for revenge.
sentences.chinese: 品红决定利用大丰报复福喜，让万福楼关门大吉。
